import React from 'react' import './Booking.css' import { Form , FormGroup , ListGroup ,ListGroupItem } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} = tour; return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating===0?null:avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
INfromation
) } export default Booking
